name: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix Test | Harry Potter

questions.text: Who gets a Howler in the beginning of the book?
questions.explanation:
Petunia Dursley.

	We found out later that the Howler comes from Dumbledore. Aunt Petunia may not be the most pleasant woman, but she did take Harry in when his parents were killed by Voldemort.

questions.text: Dudley is killed by the Dementors.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Harry saves his cousin from the Dementors by using a Patronus.

questions.text: What form does Harry's Patronus resemble?
questions.explanation:
stag.

	It's rare for someone as young as Harry to have their Patronus resemble anything.

questions.text: Besides Fred and George which other Weasley has not yet been made a prefect?
questions.explanation:
Ginny & Ginny Weasley.

	Prefects are chosen in their fifth year, Ginny is only in her fourth year.

questions.text: One of the centaurs has become an outcast to the other centaurs. What is his name?
questions.explanation:
Firenze.

	Firenze took over the Divination class when Trelawney was fired by Umbridge. The other centaurs kicked him out of the forest for serving humans. Grawp was Hagrid's half brother, Magorian is also a Centaur, and Scabbers was Ron's rat who ended up being one of Voldemort's people.

questions.text: Who recently passed the Apparition tests?
questions.explanation:
Fred and George.

	The twins apparate from upstairs to downstairs and Ron tells them if they just walked it might have taken an extra 30 seconds.

questions.text: Who has to have a trial to see if he will be expelled from Hogwarts?
questions.explanation:
Harry Potter.

	Harry used magic to stop the Dementors, which is against school rules. Magic is not allowed by minors outside of Hogwarts nor in the presence of Muggles.

questions.text: Who is the Minister of Magic?
questions.explanation:
Cornelius Fudge.

	For those of you who forgot, Tom Riddle is Voldemort's real name. Fudge despises Dumbledore because he's convinced Dumbledore wishes to have his job.

questions.text: Harry was cleared of all charges.
questions.explanation:
True.

	The trial took place on August 12th.  It looked like all hope was lost for Harry because the Ministry do not wish to believe Voldemort has returned.

questions.text: What shape does Hermione's Patronus take?
questions.explanation:
otter.

	Cho says that the Patronouses are beautiful and Harry informs her they shouldn't be beautiful, they should save her life. When Hermione's otter forms Hermoine agrees that they are quite lovely.
